actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction from gross income for funeral expenses.

summary.text: Provides a tax deduction of up to $500 from gross income for funeral expenses for any decedent which is not conpensated for out of the decedents' estate or by insurance or otherwise. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 219)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction from gross income for funeral expenses.
